modals.mailer_description: To send an email, you can choose between several mailboxes. Select your preferred one.
modals.mailer_error: You have to choose a mailbox.

projects.portfolio: This is the website you are currently on, it is a simple website portfolio, it describes all my skills but also the projects I have done over the years (personal, school or professional).
projects.filestorage: A simplified and fast data storage service allowing to emancipate from the current big companies such as Google Drive or OneDrive with questionable privacy policies.
projects.sourceconsole: A remote administration solution for servers running the Source Engine (Garry's Mod, Counter-Strike: Source, Team Fortress 2, etc.) to help inexperienced server administrators or people who do not have access to the server console.
projects.domego: The dematerialized version of an educational and serious board game with the same name to learn the steps of a public building construction operation. This project is unfinished but currently maintained by students of Polytech Nice-Sophia Antipolis.
projects.assignment: A small website designed for educational purposes to manage the homework and grades of students in a class as a teacher. The website is not intended to be used in production because it was designed in a very short time and only to learn the Angular framework.

index.footer_recaptcha: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <a1>Privacy Policy</a1> and <a2>Terms of Service</a2> apply.
index.developer_description: I'm a {{age}} year old french full-stack (junior) developer. I love to use my spare time to develop personal projects of all kinds. Passionate about computer science, I'm always looking for new technologies and new projects.

consentModal.title: Do you want a cookie?
consentModal.description: Our website uses tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The tracking will be enabled only if you accept explicitly.

sections.title: Cookie usage üì¢
sections.description: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience.

sections.title: Strictly necessary cookies
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of my website. Without these cookies, the website would not work properly

sections.title: Performance and Analytics cookies
sections.description: These cookies allow the website to remember the choices you have made in the past

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us.
